content: -50% chance to be targeted by enemies
Any enemy that hits you will be cursed and take 3x damage for the next 5sec
translation: 任何攻击你的敌人都会受到诅咒，并在接下来的5秒内受到3倍伤害
静止时+50%伤害和50%伤害减免
手雷数量+100%，最大手雷数量-10%

content: Shield can absorb unlimited damage, but breaks in 1 hit
translation: 护盾可以吸收无限伤害，但会被一击打破

content: Gain 1% ammo for every 1% health you lose
translation: 每损失1%的生命值，获得1%的弹药。

content: Break a big chunk of any terrain in 1 hit
<eff>+250%</> Power Attack <icon_rech/>\r\n\r\n<caus>Dealing Melee Damage</> awards <eff>2-18</> <icon_ston/> based on Damage dealt
translation: <eff>+250%</> Power Attack <icon_rech/>\r\n\r\n<caus>Dealing Melee Damage</> awards <eff>2-18</> <icon_ston/> based on Damage dealt

content: Adds <eff>+150%</> <icon_dmg/> but reduces Max Health by <neg>-90%</>
translation: 伤害增加150%，但最大生命值-90%
呼吸速率+10% 暴击率+5% 生命值+10% 冲刺速度+10%

content: When your shield breaks it explodes dealing 150 damage in a 3.5m radius. Adds +5 shield!
translation: 护盾破碎时会爆炸，对半径3.5米范围内的敌人造成150点伤害。增加5点护盾值！

content: <eff>+10%</> <icon_crithit/>\r\n\r\n50% of your  <caus>Critical Hit Chance</> is added as <eff>Dodge Chance</>.
translation: 暴击伤害+10%，你的暴击几率的50%会转化为闪避几率。

content: Your weapons get an added <eff>50%</> <esta>electric elemental bonus.</>
translation: 你的武器获得额外50%的电元素加成。

content: While all allies are downed you recieve {modifier}% boost to damage, defence and speed.
translation: 当所有队友倒地时，你的伤害、防御和速度将获得{modifier}%的提升。

content: Any overkill damage is transfered to the next damage you deal.\r\n\r\nCached damage diminishes slowly over time.
translation: 任何溢出的伤害都会转移到你造成的下一次伤害中。缓存的伤害会随着时间推移缓慢减少。

content: Your weapons get an added <eff>50%</> <esta>heat temperature bonus.</>
translation: 你的武器将获得额外50%的高温加成。

content: Your weapons get an added <eff>50%</> <esta>corrosive elemental bonus.</>
translation: 你的武器获得额外50%的腐蚀元素加成。

content: <caus>Every time</> a wave is spawned you get a <eff>{modifier}%</> boost to <esta>damage, defence and speed.</>\r\n\r\nLasts for <lim>30s.</>
translation: 每次生成一波敌人时，你的伤害、防御和速度都会获得{modifier}%的提升。持续30秒。

content: Increase weakpoint damage by  75%. \r\n\r\nReduces normal damage by 10%.
translation: 弱点伤害提高75%。普通伤害降低10%。

content: Being <caus>within 10m</> of an ally increases both of your <esta>Damage Resistances</> by <eff>15%</>.
translation: 与盟友保持10米以内的距离，会使你们双方的伤害抗性提高15%。
当生命值低于20%时，造成的伤害+100%。

content: <caus>All damage</> you deal gets an added <eff>50%</> <esta>Cold Temperature Bonus.</>
translation: 你造成的所有伤害都会获得额外50%的低温加成。

content: Your weapons get an added <eff>50%</> <esta>poison elemental bonus.</>
translation: 你的武器获得额外50%的毒元素加成。

content: <caus>Killing</> targets adds <eff>+20%</> <icon_dmg/> and <neg>+5%</> <esta>Damage Received</> for <neg>6s.</> \r\n\r\n<lim>Effects stack.</>
translation: 击杀敌人后，获得20%伤害加成，但受到5%额外伤害，持续6秒，效果可叠加。

content: Adds <eff>55%</> <icon_movespd/>, but <neg>reduces</> it by <neg>-10</> for each pice of Gear <caus>carried.</>
translation: 移动速度+55%，但每携带一件装备会降低10点速度。

content: Everytime you <caus>land</> you do damage in an area instead of taking damage yourself.\r\n\r\nThe <caus>harder</> you land the more damage you do.
translation: 每次你落地时，你都会对周围区域造成伤害，而不是自身受到伤害。\r\n\r\n落地越用力，造成的伤害就越大。

content: +100% Weak point DMG when standing still
+25% Damage to targets within 3m.\r\n+30% Reload Speed
translation: 对3米范围内的目标造成的伤害+25%。\r\n装填速度+30%

content: Gain <eff>40%</> <esta>Damage Reduction.</>\r\n\r\n<neg>-1%</> <esta>Damage Reduction</> for each percent of <caus>missing health</>.
translation: 获得40%伤害减免，生命值每减少1%，伤害减免降低1%。
从红糖中获得的生命值+{modifier}%
对被眩晕的目标造成的伤害+20%。

content: Hitting electrified targets with <icon_mele/> drains their electricity to send arcs of lightning to all enemies within <eff>+3</> meters.\r\n\r\nArc damage scales with damage dealt.
translation: 使用近战攻击电击异常的目标会消耗其电击效果，并向3米内的所有敌人发射电弧。\r\n\r\n电弧的伤害随造成的伤害而增加。

content: When an ally is <caus>within a</> <eff>+5m</><caus> radius</>, you both recover 1 <icon_armo/> every scond.
translation: 当队友处于半径5米以内时，你们双方每秒恢复1点弹药。

content: <caus>Being within 5 m</>  of an ally <caus>below 25% health</> makes you both heal <eff>+3%</> max <icon_hp/> every second.
translation: 当与生命值低于25%的队友保持5米以内的距离时，你们双方每秒恢复3%最大生命值。

content: <esta>Ability and Power Attack</> <icon_rech/> increases by <eff>+20%</> per <caus>burning enemy</> within 10 m.
translation: 10米范围内每有一个燃烧的敌人，技能和重击伤害增加20%。

content: <caus>While below 20%</> armor, restore <eff>+1</> <icon_armo/> every second when <caus>not taking damage for 3 seconds.</>
translation: 护盾值低于20%时，若3秒内未受到伤害，则每秒恢复1护盾值。

content: <caus>Sprinting</> into enemies deals <eff>+50</> <icon_elec/> damage on impact.\r\n\r\nDamage scales with velocity.
translation: 冲刺撞向敌人会额外造成50电击伤害，\r\n\r\n伤害随速度提升而增加。
生命值受到损伤后，获得100%伤害减免，持续1秒

content: For <caus>every 10% armor active</> you deal  <eff>+2</> <icon_ice/>  to enemies within a 4m radius per second.
translation: 每拥有10%的护盾值，每秒对半径4米内的敌人造成2点冰冻伤害。

content: When <caus>taking damage</>, you deal <eff>+{modifier}</> <icon_ice/> to nearby enemies
translation: 受到伤害时，对附近的敌人造成{modifier}的冰冻伤害

content: <caus>Critical Hits</> reduces active <esta>ability and power attack</> <icon_cool/> by <eff>+10%</> of <caus>damage dealt</>.
translation: 暴击会根据造成的伤害，技能和重击的冷却时间-10%。
受到攻击时，技能的冷却时间-5%。

content: Using your <caus>class ability</> within <eff>+10m</> <caus>of allies</> reduces yours and theirs active ability <icon_cool/> by <eff>25%.</>
translation: 在队友10米范围内使用职业技能时，你和队友的技能冷却时间-25%。

content: <caus>Standing still</> increases <icon_rech/> <esta>of ability and power attack</> by <eff>+200%.</>
translation: 静止时，技能和重击的充能速度+200%。

content: <caus>Stunning</> an enemy reduces your <esta>ability and power attack</> <icon_cool/> by <eff>+{modifier}%</>.
translation: 眩晕敌人会令你的技能和重击的冷却时间-{modifier}%。

content: For every <caus>unit of</> <caus>armor missing</>, you gain <eff>+1%</> <esta>Ability</> <icon_rech/>.
translation: 每损失1点护盾值，你的技能充能速度+1%。

content: <caus>Weakpoint Hits</> reduce active <esta>ability and power attack</> <icon_cool/> by up to <eff>+10%</>, based on damage dealt.
translation: 击中弱点时根据造成的伤害，减少技能和重击的冷却时间，最多10%。

content: <caus>Damaging</> an enemy applies <eff>+1</> <esta>stack</> of <eff>+2%</> <icon_slow/> for <eff>10s</>. \r\n\r\nStacks up to <lim>45 times.</>
translation: 对敌人造成时，为其施加1层减速效果，每层提供2%的减速，持续10秒。最多叠加45层。
对生命值低于50%的敌人造成的弱点伤害+50%。

content: Deal <eff>+30%</> <icon_weak/> damage to <caus>burning enemies</>, radiating that damage as <icon_fire/> in a 2m radius.
translation: 对燃烧中的敌人造成的弱点伤害+30%，并将这部分伤害转化为火焰伤害向半径2米范围扩散。
对10米以外的敌人造成的弱点伤害+50%。

content: <caus>Critical Hits</> make the target take <eff>2x</> <icon_dmg/> for <eff>+1 sec</>
translation: 暴击时使敌人在1秒内受到的伤害翻倍。

content: Everytime you <caus>hit an enemy</> you get<eff>+1%</> <icon_crithit/> until you inflict a critical hit.
translation: 每次命中敌人时，你的暴击率+1%，直至你造成1次暴击为止。

content: <eff>+25%</> <icon_crithit/> and <icon_critdmg/> for 5 seconds after scoring a <caus>Critical Hit.</>
translation: 造成暴击后的5秒内，你的暴击率和暴击伤害+25%。

content: The first <eff>+1</> shots <caus>in your magazine</> have 100% <icon_crithit/>
translation: 弹匣中的第1发子弹暴击率+100%。

content: <caus>Critical</> <icon_mele/> <caus>hits</> damage all other enemies within <eff>+4</> meters of the target.
translation: 近战攻击造成暴击时，对目标半径4米范围内的所有敌人造成伤害。

content: <caus>Dealing</> <caus>melee damage</> makes you <esta>invincible</> for <eff>+2s.</>\r\n\r\nHas a <lim>3 second cooldown.</>
translation: 近战攻击造成伤害时，获得2秒的无敌状态。冷却时间3秒。

content: <caus>Dealing melee damage</> makes the target take <eff>200%</> <icon_dmg/> for <eff>+3s</>
translation: 近战造成伤害时，使其在3秒内受到的伤害额外+200%
近战攻击造成伤害时，重击的冷却时间-25%。
近战攻击会使敌人眩晕1.5秒。

content: For every <caus>frozen enemy</> within 5m you gain <eff>+10%</> <icon_mele/> <esta>damage</>
translation: 5米范围内每有一个处于冰冻状态的敌人，你的近战伤害+10%。

content: When <esta>Class Ability</> is <caus>on cooldown</> your Pickaxe <icon_dmg/> and Power Attack <icon_rech/> increases by <eff>+20%.</>
translation: 技能处于冷却状态时，近战伤害和重击充能速度+20%。

content: <eff>+20%</> chance to spawn an Adhesive Snare <caus>on kill</> that does 99%<icon_slow/>.
translation: 击杀敌人时，有20%几率生成一个粘性陷阱，该陷阱造成99%的减速效果。

content: Spawn poison clouds <caus> while moving.</>\r\n\r\nClouds last <eff>+2</> seconds and deals 50 <icon_pois/> per second and 30% <icon_slow/>.
translation: 移动时会生成毒云。毒云持续2秒，每秒造成50点毒素伤害和30%的减速效果。

content: <eff>+ 10%</> <esta>chance</> to shoot a <esta>magic missile</> <caus>when firing</> your weapon
translation: 射击时有10%的几率额外发射一枚魔法飞弹。

content: Spawn flames <caus>while moving </>. \r\n\r\nFlames last <eff>+2</> seconds & deal 7-28 <icon_fire/> damage per second and 10% <icon_slow/>.
translation: 移动时会在身后生成火焰轨迹。火焰持续时间+2秒，每秒对站在其中的敌人造成7-28点火焰伤害并附带10%减速效果。

content: <caus>Killing a burning enemy</> deals <eff>+150</> <icon_fire/> <esta>Damage</> within a 3m radius.
translation: 击杀正在燃烧的敌人时，会在其半径3米范围内造成150点火焰伤害。
触发暴击时，额外造成50%火焰伤害。
在空中时，额外获得1次跳跃机会。

content: Scoring <caus>two Weakpoint Hits in a row on the same target</> makes it drop <eff>+1</> red sugar (20 <icon_hp/>).\r\n\r\n0.5 Second Cooldown.
translation: 连续2次击中同一敌人的弱点时，会使其掉落1块红糖（恢复20点生命值）。冷却时间0.5秒。

content: Gain <eff>2</> seconds of immunity after <caus>using your suit ability.</> \r\n\r\n<caus>Every hit recieved</> during this time recovers <eff>+5</> <icon_armo/>
translation: 使用套装能力后，获得2秒免疫时间。在此期间每受到1次攻击，恢复5点护盾值。

content: Recover <eff>+5</> <icon_armo/> when scoring <caus>two</> weakpoint hits in a row.
translation: 连续2次命中弱点时，恢复5点护盾值。
击杀敌人会使你恢复2点护盾值。

content: Convert <eff>1%</> target max health into <icon_ammo/> <caus>on kill.</>
translation: 击杀敌人时，将目标最大生命值的1%转化为弹药。

content: Scoring <caus> two weakpoint hits</> in a row with a weapon or tool moves <eff>+1</> <icon_ammo/> to its magazine.
translation: 连续使用武器或工具命中弱点2次时，为该武器的弹匣补充1发弹药。

content: <caus>Killing enemies</> make them explode, dealing <icon_expl/> damage equal to kill damage in a <eff>+1.5m</> Radius
translation: 击杀敌人时，会使其爆炸，在半径1.5米范围内造成等同于击杀伤害的爆炸伤害。

content: Deal <eff>+{modifier}</> <icon_expl/> <esta>Damage</> in a 5m radius after <caus>suffering 50 damage</> total.
translation: 累计受到50点伤害后，在半径5米范围内造成{modifier}点爆炸伤害。

content: While your health <caus>is above 25%</> you attract <eff>+30%</> enemy aggro!
translation: 当你的生命值高于25%时，你将额外吸引30%的敌人仇恨！

content: When your health <caus>goes under 25%</> you <esta>spawn</>  <eff>+1 decoy</>.
translation: 当你的生命值低于25%时，你将生成1个诱饵。

content: <esta>Heal</> <eff>+7</> <icon_hp/> on <caus>Melee Kill</> of <lim>medium sized</> or <lim>larger creatures</>
translation: 通过近战击杀中型或大型敌人时，恢复7点生命值。

content: <eff>25% </><esta>Chance</> for <lim>medium sized</> or <lim>larger enemies</> to drop <eff>+1</> Red Sugar (10 <icon_hp/>) <caus>on death.</>
translation: 中型或大型敌人在死亡时，有25%的几率额外掉落1块红糖（恢复10点生命值）。

content: When <caus>below 50%</> Max Health <caus>killing</> an enemy will make it <esta>drop</> <eff>+1 </><esta>Red Sugar</>. (10 <icon_hp/>)
translation: 当生命值低于最大值的50%时，击杀敌人将使其额外掉落1块红糖（恢复10点生命值）。

content: <caus>While armor is active</>, auto-fire <eff>+1</> <esta>homing bolt</> that deals 20 <icon_elec/> Damage.\r\n\r\nBolt <icon_rof/> scales per % of armor active.
translation: 当护盾处于激活状态时，自动发射1个追踪电荷，造成20点电击伤害。电荷的射速随当前护甲的百分比而提高。

content: Every <caus>1%</> <caus>ammo missing</> in your magazine adds <eff>+1%</> <icon_dmg/>
translation: 弹匣中每减少1%的弹药，伤害额外+1%。

content: When <caus>within 5m</> Of Another Player You Both Deal <eff>+33%</> <icon_dmg/>
translation: 当你位于另一位玩家5米范围内时，双方伤害+33%。
每拥有10%当前生命值，伤害+3%。

content: <caus>Hitting a target weakpoint</> at a distance of <caus>+12 meters</> grants <eff>100%</> <icon_crithit/> against it for <lim>5 seconds.</>
translation: 在12米外的距离击中敌人弱点时，赋予其100%暴击率，持续5秒。

content: For <caus>every 10% active armor</> you gain <eff>+5%</> <icon_Sprintspd/> and <eff>2%</> less gravity.
translation: 每拥有10%护甲，你的冲刺速度+5%，重力-2%。

content: When <caus>poisoned enemies within</> <eff>+5m</> <caus> get hurt</>, you restore 1 <icon_hp/>  per enemy.
translation: 当5米范围内每有一个中毒的敌人受到伤害时，你的生命值+1。
每拥有1点护盾值，电击伤害+1%。
装填时，移动速度+45%，持续2秒。

content: <caus>Being within +3m of electrified enemies</> regenerates <eff>1</> <icon_armo/> per enemy every second.
translation: 每处于电击敌人的3米范围内时，每秒根据敌人数量，恢复1点护盾值。

content: Do <eff>+1%</> <icon_fire/> per <caus>1% ammo missing</> from your magazine.
translation: 弹匣中每减少1%的弹药，额外造成1%的火焰伤害。

content: <caus>Frozen enemies within 5m</> take <eff>+10</> <icon_dmg/> per second and recovers your <icon_armo/> by <eff>1.</>
translation: 5米范围内的冰冻敌人每秒额外受到10点伤害，并且每个敌人每秒使你恢复1点护盾值。
增加{modifier}点生命值。治疗量为100%。

content: <caus>Killing medium or large frozen targets</> gives <eff>+3</> <icon_ston/>.\r\n\r\n<caus>Critical kills</> triples it.
translation: 击杀中型或大型冰冻敌人时，给予3点石化资源。暴击击杀会使获得的资源量翻3倍。

content: <caus>Reloading or overheating</> emits a toxic pulse in a <eff>+4m</> radius., dealing <eff>10</> <icon_pois/> per 10% magazine spent or heat built up.
translation: 装填或过热时，在半径4米内释放毒性脉冲，每消耗10%弹匣或热量造成10点毒素伤害。

content: <caus>Killing poisoned targets</> leaves behind a poison cloud lasting <eff>+5</> seconds, dealing 50 <icon_pois/> damage per second.
translation: 击杀中毒敌人时，会留下持续5秒的毒云，每秒造成50点毒素伤害。

content: <caus>Hitting frozen</> non-boss enemies below 10% health, has a <eff>+20%</> chance to shatter them.
translation: 攻击生命值低于10%的冰冻非Boss敌人时，有20%的几率将其秒杀。
将40%的基础伤害转化为毒素伤害。
释放绳索后，获得50%摔落抵抗。
额外攻击被激光指示的敌人
增加未使用时的冷却速度
减少钻击敌人时产生的热量
增加30%自动加农炮的最大射击速率
增加使用抓钩后的移动速度
增加20秒照明弹持续时间
增加聚焦时的瞄准辅助
额外增加40%基础伤害，并将其转化为冰冻伤害
额外增加40%基础伤害，并将其转化为腐蚀伤害

content: Overclock: Rapid Fire (+30% Rate of Fire)
Overclock: Sharp shooter (-30% Spread, +25% Weakpoint Damage)
translation: 超频：神枪手（-30%扩散，+25%弱点伤害）

content: Overclock: Slick (+35% Reload Speed, +1 Rate of Fire)
translation: 超频：精巧（+35%装填速度，+1射速）

content: Unstable: Mega Caliber (+50% Damage, +5 Damage, +30% Recoil, -30% Rate of Fire)
translation: 不稳定：巨型口径（+50%伤害，+5伤害，+30%后坐力，-30%射速）

content: Unstable: Rapid Fire (+30% Rate of Fire, +30% Magazine, +20% Spread)
translation: 不稳定：速射（+30%射速，+30%弹匣容量，+20%扩散）
额外增加40%基础伤害，并将其转化为火焰伤害
减少90%移动时的子弹扩散
全自动类型和双倍弹匣容量
额外增加40%基础伤害，并将其转化为电击伤害
火箭的电击效果+100%，且火箭的爆炸半径+1米。

content: Rockets get<eff>+100%</> <icon_fire/>.\r\n\r\nSpawns fire within the <caus>impact zone.</>
translation: 火箭的火焰效果+100%。在撞击区域内生成火焰。
普通子弹获得30%电击效果
普通子弹获得30%腐蚀效果。

content: Rockets get <eff>+100%</> <icon_ice/>.\r\n\r\n<eff>+1m</> to Rocket Explosion Radius.
translation: 火箭的冰冻效果+100%。爆炸半径+1米。
普通子弹获得30%火焰效果

content: <caus>When Cooper revives you</>, you recover <eff>+20%</> <icon_hp/> and <eff>+10%</> <icon_armo/>.
translation: Cooper将你复活时，你获得20%生命值和10%护盾值。

content: Rockets get <eff>100%</> <icon_pois/>.\r\n\r\nSpawns a toxic cloud <caus>on impact.</>
translation: 火箭获得100%中毒效果。撞击时生成一团毒云。

content: Rockets get <eff>+100%</> <icon_corr/>.\r\n\r\n<caus>Spawns</> corrosive puddles within the impact zone.
translation: 火箭获得100%腐蚀效果。在撞击区域生成腐蚀粘液坑。

content: Cooper revive capacity is increased by <eff>1.</>

translation: 普通子弹获得30%冰冻效果
普通子弹获得30%中毒效果

content: Adds <eff>+{modifier}%</> <icon_stun/> chance to Machine Gun fire.
Fully portable and constructed from lightweight components, this handy gadget will fire a steel-reinforced tether across any chasm you might happen upon in the depths.
translation: 这款便利的装备完全便携，采用轻质组件制造，能向您在深渊中遇见的任何裂隙发射钢缆牵引绳。

content: Fully portable and constructed from lightweight components, this handy gadget will fire a steel-reinforced tether across any chasm you might happen upon in the depths.
translation: 这款便利的装备完全便携，采用轻质组件制造，能向您在深渊中遇见的任何裂隙发射钢缆牵引绳。

content: The ultimate explorer's tool - this self-recharging grappling hook will get you out of any sticky situation, and onto any distant ledge. Handle with care - ending up dangling from the ceiling and then dropping 60 feet onto the floor is not covered by the employee insurance.
translation: 作为探险家的终极装备，这款自动充能抓钩能助你脱离任何险境，抵达任何远方的岩架。请谨慎使用——若不幸悬吊在半空后从60英尺高处坠落，员工保险可不涵盖此类状况。

content: The ultimate explorer's tool - this self-recharging grappling hook will get you out of any sticky situation, and onto any distant ledge. Handle with care - ending up dangling from the ceiling and then dropping 60 feet onto the floor is not covered by the employee insurance.
translation: 作为探险家的终极装备，这款自动充能抓钩能助你脱离任何险境，抵达任何远方的岩架。请谨慎使用——若不幸悬吊在半空后从60英尺高处坠落，员工保险可不涵盖此类状况。

content: It does what it says on the box. By firing a combination of highly volatile chemicals at a nearby wall, the result is a rapidly solidifying concrete-like foam that can support several tons of weight. Do not ingest!
translation: 功能一如包装所言。 通过向邻近墙面喷射多种高挥发性化学混合物，可瞬间生成足以承载数吨重量的速凝类混凝土泡沫。严禁食用！

content: It does what it says on the box. By firing a combination of highly volatile chemicals at a nearby wall, the result is a rapidly solidifying concrete-like foam that can support several tons of weight. Do not ingest!
translation: 功能一如包装所言。 通过向邻近墙面喷射多种高挥发性化学混合物，可瞬间生成足以承载数吨重量的速凝类混凝土泡沫。严禁食用！
矮人弹射器 警告：原型机 - 可能坠毁

content: Deploys a set of platforms that launches dwarfs from one place to the next. Safety guarenteed
translation: 部署一套能够将矮人从一处发射至另一处的弹射平台。安全保障，放心使用。

content: A powerful projectile launcher that shoots high-intensity, adhesive flares. The flares can attach to even the hardest material.
translation: 一款可发射高强度黏性信号弹的强大投掷装置。所发出的信号弹甚至能附着在最坚硬的材质表面。

content: A powerful projectile launcher that shoots high-intensity, adhesive flares. The flares can attach to even the hardest material.
translation: 一款可发射高强度黏性信号弹的强大投掷装置。所发出的信号弹甚至能附着在最坚硬的材质表面。

content: One of the classic workhorses of DRG, the twin-linked Power Drill makes short work of more or less anything unfortunate enough to be in front of it. That includes your teammates, mind.
translation: 作为深石集团经典主力装备之一，这台双联动力钻机能迅速解决任何不幸挡在它前方的物体——当然，这包括您的队友，请注意。

content: Projects an energy bubble that simultaneously keeps you reasonably safe from harm while recharging your shield. Comfortably fits a full team inside! Don't get too comfy, however...the effects do not last long.
translation: 生成一道能量护罩，能在为您提供可靠防护的同时为护盾充能。内部空间充裕，可容纳整个小队！但别太过安逸……毕竟护罩效果无法持久。

content: A gravity defying device. When deployed, it generates a shaft of anti-gravity that can be used for vertical traversal
translation: 一款颠覆重力的装置。部署后能生成反重力竖井，可供进行垂直移动。

content: A throwable device that intertwine the fates of enemies. Damaging one enemy within the items radius will transfer a portion of the damage to all other enemies within the radius
translation: 一款可投掷的命运交织装置。对作用范围内任一敌人造成伤害时，会将部分伤害转移至范围内的所有其他敌人。

content: Projects an energy bubble that simultaneously keeps you reasonably safe from harm while recharging your shield. Comfortably fits a full team inside! Don't get too comfy, however...the effects do not last long.
translation: 生成一道能量护罩，能在为您提供可靠防护的同时为护盾充能。内部空间充裕，可容纳整个小队！但别太过安逸……毕竟护罩效果无法持久。

content: Carry more ammo at the cost of a weapon slot
translation: 牺牲一个武器栏位以携带更多弹药

content:
On use:
+80% Recoil control
+100% Spread reduction
+100% Movement speed 
+100% Jump Height
+100% Fall Damage Reduction

Duration: 30 Seconds
Costs: 45 Health
translation: 使用效果：+80%后坐力控制 +100%散射抑制 +100% 移动速度 +100%跳跃高度 +100%摔落伤害减免 持续时间：30秒 消耗：45点生命值

content: This device produces a disturbing screech when thrown that can disperce crowds of enemies. Its pitch can also shatter frozen enemies
translation: 该装置在投掷时会发出令人不适的尖啸，可驱散敌群。其特定音调还能震碎遭冻结的敌人。

content: The IFG - or Inhibitor-Field Generator - is one of the latest inventions of the good people down in R&D. Toss one of these bad boys into a cluster of bugs, and watch them slow right down.
translation: IFG——即抑制力场发生器——是研发部那些天才们的最新发明之一。只需往虫群里扔进这宝贝，就能看着它们动作瞬间迟缓下来。

content: Projects an energy bubble that simultaneously keeps you reasonably safe from harm while recharging your shield. Comfortably fits a full team inside! Don't get too comfy, however...the effects do not last long.
translation: 生成一道能量护罩，能在为您提供可靠防护的同时为护盾充能。内部空间充裕，可容纳整个小队！但别太过安逸……毕竟护罩效果无法持久。

content: A sinister device that turns life into Red Sugar. Deploying this device will create Red Sugar when enemies are defeated within its radius.
translation: 一款能将生命转化为红糖的诡谲装置。部署后，在其作用范围内击败敌人即可生成红糖。

content: You take a shotgun and cut it in half. You're left with a light handcannon that handles like a large pistol and has the stopping power of an 18-wheeler loaded with watermelons. A true classic.
translation: 你把霰弹枪锯成两截，得到一把轻巧的手持火炮——它有着大型手枪般的操控手感，却具备堪比满载西瓜的十八轮大卡车的制止力。真正的经典之作。

content: Launches the plasma projectiles at a higher velocity.
translation: 以更高速度发射等离子射弹。

content: Living up to its name, this pig of a weapon never fails to satisfy. Holds six wide-spread shells for rapid-fire death-dealing.
translation: 正如其名，这头凶悍的武器从不令人失望。装填六发散布弹壳，带来速射死亡的极致体验。

content: One of the more advanced items in the DRG arsenal, these autonomous sentry guns will absolutely help in performing pest control.
translation: 作为深岩集团军火库中较为先进的装备，这些自动哨戒炮将在害虫清理任务中提供绝对可靠的支援。

content: One of the more advanced items in the DRG arsenal, these autonomous sentry guns will absolutely help in performing pest control.
translation: 作为深岩集团军火库中较为先进的装备，这些自动哨戒炮将在害虫清理任务中提供绝对可靠的支援。

content: A small, light semi-automatic for small, light dwarves. More deadly than it appears.
translation: 一款为身形灵巧的矮人打造的轻便型半自动手枪。其外观所见远超致命性。

content: Designed for covert operations and mobility while retaining fire power suited for high intensity combat.\r\n\r\nThe Devestator Blaster Pistol is small but boasts stopping power rivaling heavier ordinance, but this advantage comes at the cost of its high energy consumption and limited power supply, demanding frequent reloading and resupplying.
translation: 专为隐秘行动与高机动性设计，同时保留足以应对高强度交火的战斗力。毁灭者爆破手枪虽体积紧凑，其制止力却堪比重型武器。但此优势的代价是高昂能耗与有限供能，需要频繁装填与补给。

content: Big and deadly and dirty. Too bad plutonium is so heavy that you can only take a few rounds with you. And remember to take care with the fallout.
translation: 硕大、致命且污秽。可惜钚元素过于沉重，仅能携带数发弹药。还请务必小心处理辐射尘。

content: Shoots mini nuclear warheads that do massive damage in a large area
translation: 发射微型核弹头，能在广阔区域内造成巨额伤害。

content: Fully automatic high power rifle.\r\n\r\nEquipped with a floating barrel to reduce spread amd improve shot accuracy it nevertheless kicks like a mule.
translation: 全自动大威力步枪。配备浮动式枪管以抑制散射提升精度，但其后坐力仍如骡踢般强劲。

content: A dependable, hefty weapon. Usually not the first choice of proper dwarves, but the combination of heft, weight, and satisfying boom makes it worthwhile all the same.
translation: 一把可靠而笨重的武器。虽非正统矮人的首选，但其沉甸甸的分量、压手的重量与酣畅的轰鸣声，依然令人觉得物超所值。

content: Be it an obstacle or particularly thickheaded adversary, a good ol' Satchel Charge usually gets the job done. Stand well back before hitting the trigger.
translation: 无论是障碍物还是特别顽固的敌人，老牌炸药包总能搞定。按下引爆器前记得退到安全距离。

content: Known for its exceptionally high velocity bullets, LARK Series-10 is an effective and reliable pistol in the hands of an accurate gunslinger.\r\n\r\nThe secret-formula smokeless propellent powder and innovative bullet design makes an abundance of ammo particularly easy to carry.
translation: 以超高速子弹闻名的云雀系列-10，在神枪手掌控下是把高效可靠的手枪。秘密配方的无烟推进火药与创新弹头设计，令弹药的随身携带格外轻松。

content: A custom revolver firing rounds so large it only holds 4 shots. More or less nothing can stand before a direct hit from one of these 26mm monstrosities.
translation: 一把定制型左轮，因其发射的弹体过大，仅能填装四发弹药。几乎没有任何目标能承受住这26mm凶器的一次直击。

content: The Breach Cutter releases directional blasts of sonically-charged plasma powerful enough to deal with most any alien in your path. Originally a mining tool, it's now been frequency-tuned to crack open flesh and bone rather than the sediment deposits it was designed for - often with quite spectacular results!
translation: 破障切割器能释放声波充能的定向等离子冲击，其威力足以清除前行之路上绝大多数外星生物。原本作为采矿工具设计，现经频率调谐后专用于撕裂血肉与骨骼——效果往往相当震撼！

content: The Breach Cutter releases directional blasts of sonically-charged plasma powerful enough to deal with almost any alien in your path. Originally a mining tool, it's now been frequency-tuned to crack open flesh and bone rather than the sediment deposits it was designed for - often with quite spectacular results!
translation: 破障切割器能释放声波充能的定向等离子冲击，其威力足以清除前行之路上绝大多数外星生物。原本作为采矿工具设计，现经频率调谐后专用于撕裂血肉与骨骼——效果往往相当震撼！

content: This is a weapon description.\r\n\r\nAnother row of text description.
translation: 此为武器描述。另一行文本说明。

content: A dependable, hefty weapon. Usually not the first choice of proper dwarves, but the combination of heft, weight, and satisfying boom makes it worthwhile all the same.
translation: 一把可靠而笨重的武器。虽非正统矮人的首选，但其沉甸甸的分量、压手的重量与酣畅的轰鸣声，依然令人觉得物超所值。

content: A small, light semi-automatic for small, light dwarves. More deadly than it appears.
translation: 一款为身形灵巧的矮人打造的轻便型半自动手枪。其外观所见远超致命性。

content: A dependable, hefty weapon. Usually not the first choice of proper dwarves, but the combination of heft, weight, and satisfying boom makes it worthwhile all the same.
translation: 一把可靠而笨重的武器。虽非正统矮人的首选，但其沉甸甸的分量、压手的重量与酣畅的轰鸣声，依然令人觉得物超所值。

content: When bullets or blunt force just don't cut it, a sea of roaring, sticky napalm  usually does. Practically never explodes in your face.
translation: 当子弹与钝器都无济于事时，一片翻腾的黏性凝固汽油海往往能解决问题。这玩意儿基本不会在您面前爆炸——基本不会。

content: Energy shotgun description goes here...blah blah\r\nNOTE: Two fire modes! Hold down trigger to charge, let go for close range fun ;-)
translation: 能量霰弹枪描述占位文本……此处省略 注意：双开火模式！长按扳机蓄能，松开享受近程狂欢 ;-)

content: An advanced blaster-type energy rifle that can provide both intense and accurate fire-power. \r\n\r\nEven though the P-96 Mag Blaster offers an excellent perfomance across the board, it has failed to see wide spread adoption due to it's exceedingly difficult and expensive manufacturing process.
translation: 一款先进的爆能型能量步枪，可同时提供高强度与高精度火力。尽管P-96磁爆轰击者具备全方位优异性能，却因极其复杂昂贵的制造工艺未能广泛列装。

content: Powerful explosive grenade \r\n\r\nCan be held before throwing to shorten it's fuse
translation: 威力强大的爆破手雷 投掷前长按可缩短引信

content: A standard high-explosive grenade with a medium kill radius. Can be used to remove dirt or bugs or both.
translation: 标准高爆手雷，具备中等致死半径。可用于清除岩土、虫群，或两者一并解决。

content: The Plasma Burster explodes up to four times as it impacts and bounces along the cave
translation: 等离子爆雷在洞穴中撞击弹跳时，最多可引爆四次

content: The Plasma Burster does more or less what you'd expect from the name. It releases 4 bursts of scorching plasma in rapid succession upon being thrown. Keep away from beards at all costs.
translation: 等离子爆雷的功能基本如其名所示：投掷后会连续迸发四波灼热等离子体。务必远离所有胡须——无论如何。

content: Heavy machine pistol, easily carried when doing difficult caving.
translation: 重型机枪手枪，在进行艰难洞穴勘探时便于携带。

content: As powerful as it is impractical, the Hammer Caster is certain to give the wielder sore arms.\r\n\r\nIt fires devestating 38mm rounds with enough stopping power to damage targets even when hitting armor.
translation: 其威力与不便程度旗鼓相当，重锤发射器注定会让使用者手臂酸痛。它所发射的毁灭性38毫米弹头，其制止力足以在命中装甲时仍对目标造成损伤。

content: A hand-carryable, flully-fledged railgun system. It fires solid tungsten spheres with enough force to punch clean through solid rock and turn the air around its trajectory burning hot. The only limit to this pocket-sized war crime is the battery pack - which is sizable.
translation: 一套可手持的完整轨道炮系统。它发射的实心钨球蕴含足够动能，既能贯穿坚固岩层，又可使弹道周边空气剧烈升温。这款口袋级战争罪行的唯一制约在于其电池组——体积相当可观。

content: A small, light semi-automatic for small, light dwarves. More deadly than it appears.
translation: 一款为身形灵巧的矮人打造的轻便型半自动手枪。其外观所见远超致命性。

content: A small, light semi-automatic for small, light dwarves. More deadly than it appears.
translation: 一款为身形灵巧的矮人打造的轻便型半自动手枪。其致命性远超外观所见。

content: Fires force fields that block enemy attacks and deals damage. Intensily slows down enemies in the field
translation: 发射可阻挡敌方攻击的力场并造成伤害。强烈减速力场内的敌人。

content: Designed for covert operations and mobility while retaining fire power suited for high intensity combat.\r\n\r\nThe Devestator Blaster Pistol is small but boasts stopping power rivaling heavier ordinance, but this advantage comes at the cost of its high energy consumption and limited power supply, demanding frequent reloading and resupplying.
translation: 专为隐秘行动与高机动性设计，同时保留足以应对高强度交火的战斗力。毁灭者爆破手枪虽体积紧凑，其制止力却堪比重型武器。但此优势的代价是高昂能耗与有限供能，需要频繁装填与补给。

content: A small, light semi-automatic for small, light dwarves. More deadly than it appears.
translation: 一款为身形灵巧的矮人打造的轻便型半自动手枪。其外观所见远超致命性。

content: Replacing the pickaxe, this hammer can be both thrown, used as a melee weapon like the pickaxe and remove dirt. However, make sure to recall it before trying to carve terrain.
translation: 这把取代矿镐的战锤既可投掷，也能如矿镐般用于近战与清除岩土。但需注意：进行地形改造前务必将其召回。

content: Capable of accelerating particles at baffling velocities, the MM-4 Rail Pistol deals grievous damage with high precision. \r\n\r\nIt can be charged for higher damage and armor piercing capabilities.
translation: MM-4轨道手枪能以惊人速度加速粒子，藉此造成重创且精度极高。可通过蓄力提升伤害并增强穿甲能力。

content: A weapon that fires small timed grenades. Powerful but tricky to use.
translation: 一款发射定时小型榴弹的武器。威力强大但需要技巧方能驾驭。

content: A small, light semi-automatic for small, light dwarves. More deadly than it appears.
translation: 一款为身形灵巧的矮人打造的轻便型半自动手枪。其外观所见远超致命性。

content:
A powerful electric discharge pistol. Its contruction features a supercapacitor that rapidly charges and can generatine an impressive lightning bolt when fired.

Although it can be fired before fully charged, a higher charge increases damage dealt as well as how many nearby targets the shock can jolt.

Due to its passive charge capacitor the Shock Striker makes for an excellent and potent sidearm.
translation: 一款强大的放电手枪。其结构采用超级电容器实现快速充能，击发时可生成惊人的闪电束。虽可在未完全充能时发射，但更高的充能等级不仅能提升伤害，还能增加可震颤的邻近目标数量。凭借其被动充能电容的特性，电击Striker成为一把极佳的高效能副手武器。

content: One of the classic workhorses of DRG, the twin-linked Power Drill makes short work of more or less anything unfortunate enough to be in front of it. That includes your teammates, mind.
translation: 作为深岩集团经典主力装备之一，这台双联动力钻机能迅速解决任何不幸挡在它前方的物体——当然，这包括您的队友，请注意。

content: One of the classic workhorses of DRG, the twin-linked Power Drill makes short work of more or less anything unfortunate enough to be in front of it. That includes your team mates, mind.
translation: 作为深岩集团经典主力装备之一，这台双联动力钻机能迅速解决任何不幸挡在它前方的物体——当然，这包括您的队友，请注意。

content: A gun that always deals 10% of the targets current health.
translation: 一把恒定削减目标当前生命值10%的枪械。

content: A small, light semi-automatic for small, light dwarves. More deadly than it appears.
translation: 一款为身形灵巧的矮人打造的轻便型半自动手枪。其外观所见远超致命性。
[职业能力] + [使用] 投掷弹药
[职业能力] + [切换物品] 切换雷达
[职业能力] + [使用] 启动狂暴
[职业能力] + [切换物品] 护盾
[职业能力] + [使用] 部署装甲信标
状态 状态 状态
[职业能力] + [使用] 远程复活
[职业能力] + [切换物品] 雷霆杖
获得额外2次技能充能次数
为劈砍攻击附加炽热等离子
